import React, { Component } from 'react'; import statsService from '../services/statsService'; class Stats extends React.Component { state = { topSellers: [], topUniqueSellers: [] } async componentDidMount() { const { data: topSellers } = await statsService.getTopSellers(); const { data: topUniqueSellers } = await statsService.getUniqueSellers() this.setState({ topSellers: topSellers, topUniqueSellers: topUniqueSellers }); console.log(this.state.topSellers, this.state.topUniqueSellers); } render() { let { products } = this.state; return (

); } } export default Stats;
